tweets.text: Graphics pitch: flowchart / sankey of every possible outcome of the election (landslide vs close, transfer of power vs contested, all sub-permutations), with a subjective rating if likelihood from a panel of experts
@Joshochos Yesssss
RT @mrejfox: Does anyone know of any datasets/analysis of people relocating during the pandemic? (From/to/when data, ideally)

@mdavidallen This is really valuable feedback. Something in my gut says that the combination of a product team freed from the concept of a traditional CMS can create better, more efficient, better optimized across delivery streams, and that will help it stand out. Need to lay that out better.
RT @mdavidallen: @mrejfox Suppose $70k/mo burn. You'll need months of that prior to any profitability, implying fundraising. For that you h‚Ä¶
RT @mdavidallen: @mrejfox I don't really know much about news organizations, but I do know some stuff about starting new orgs & startups, a‚Ä¶
@kathyqian_ Agreed, this is a smart way of thinking about it. I'm curious what the next step up (or two) looks like, though.

@awinston My thinking was trying to split the difference between being responsive to news events vs longer reported uniquely-presented specials and increase output once a brand/voice/reputation has been built slowly and carefully, but that might be naive if the goal is large audience

looking at some old napkin math of what an MVP for a news organization might look like, I know I am forgetting important things, no way it's this simple, but curious what people think https://t.co/ov4Fy4rU6S

@Ergoat Insiders think its still happening or coming back. Outsiders think it dissolved thru disorganization. Few remember cop repression.
@Ergoat I‚Äôve been thinking about this a lot lately. A lot of people want to ignore the failures and press on. Learning from them is crucial.
@Ergoat What exactly was the ‚Äúlast GA‚Äù - last I went to was on mayday, I think.
@hyphy_republic Thats what I‚Äôm saying. Too late now. Would have required some realistic forethought anyway. Part of me thought it‚Äôd last.
@hyphy_republic Any GA with quorum would be irresponsible to end it inherently. More than x months without quorum should trigger resolution.

playing a little Fable II. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo
Late-night Amazon purchases... just bought 3 new SD cards for my field audio recorder and imaginary future D90. 16GB 4GB 2GB
Yesterday I switched HD on for my XBOX. 1080i, I think. It's so much better. I hadn't tried it because I didn't know my monitor could deal.
Funnily enough, wearing two rings makes me feel twice as badass as wearing 1 ring.
85% clean. Cleanest it's been in a while. And now; sleep.
Back home, and so so tired. Got homework to do and an essay to write. A nap seems in order...
Gym. Kind of cold, but not as cold as these people seem to think.
Trying out the Inconsolata font in TextMate. I actually kind of like it. It feels more compact than Monaco, but no readability loss.
Did some homework (spanish and english) but I feel like I'm forgetting something. Not enjoying that feeling. Gym/Football today.
Getting out of the shower thinking "showers are the shit" "____ is the shit" is getting overused by my mind lately. Replacement suggestions?
Reading of Reflective Equilibrium and the three fold law, and then I'm going to sleep.
